Externalizer

Implemented in class xdoclet.modules.externalizer.ExternalizerTagsHandler.

  • Block Tags
  • Content Tags

Block Tags:

forAllFieldTags (block template)

Evaluate the body for all field tags. Works only in context of ExternalizerSubTask.

Content templates:

bundleKey (content template)

current resource bundle name, will be called by TranslatorSubTask

key (content template)

value (content template)
